languages.text: "На вашем месте я бы стойко принял оценку префекта и вооружился горьким опытом Тассеры. Жизнь порой дает под дых так, что не увернуться, поэтому важно уметь держать удар".

"If I were in your position, I would take the prefect's evaluation in stride and learn from your painful experience on Thassera. Sometimes, life knocks the wind out of you in a way that can't be dodged, so it helps to learn how to take a hit."
languages.original_text: "На вашем месте я бы стойко принял оценку префекта и вооружился горьким опытом Тассеры. Жизнь порой дает под дых так, что не увернуться, поэтому важно уметь держать удар".

languages.text: 「もし私があなたの立場なら、総監の評価は素直に受け止めて、タッセーラでのつらい経験から学ぶでしょう。人生というのは時に、避けようのない形で息の根を止めにきます。だからこそ、打たれ強さを身につけることが大切なのです」
languages.original_text: "If I were in your position, I would take the prefect's evaluation in stride and learn from your painful experience on Thassera. Sometimes, life knocks the wind out of you in a way that can't be dodged, so it helps to learn how to take a hit."

traits.locale_text: 「もし私があなたの立場なら、総監の評価は素直に受け止めて、タッセーラでのつらい経験から学ぶでしょう。人生というのは時に、避けようのない形で息の根を止めにきます。だからこそ、打たれ強さを身につけることが大切なのです」

languages.text: "An Eurer Stelle würde ich die Einschätzung der Präfektin locker nehmen und aus der schmerzvollen Erfahrung auf Thassera lernen. Manchmal nimmt das Leben einem den Wind aus den Segeln, ohne dass man etwas tun kann, also sollte man lernen, mit Flauten umzugehen."
languages.original_text: "If I were in your position, I would take the prefect's evaluation in stride and learn from your painful experience on Thassera. Sometimes, life knocks the wind out of you in a way that can't be dodged, so it helps to learn how to take a hit."

traits.locale_text: "An Eurer Stelle würde ich die Einschätzung der Präfektin locker nehmen und aus der schmerzvollen Erfahrung auf Thassera lernen. Manchmal nimmt das Leben einem den Wind aus den Segeln, ohne dass man etwas tun kann, also sollte man lernen, mit Flauten umzugehen."

languages.text: « À votre place, j'accepterais cette évaluation sans sourciller et je tenterais de tirer une leçon de cette expérience douloureuse sur Thassera. On ne peut pas toujours éviter les coups du sort, mais il est possible d'apprendre à les encaisser. »
languages.original_text: "If I were in your position, I would take the prefect's evaluation in stride and learn from your painful experience on Thassera. Sometimes, life knocks the wind out of you in a way that can't be dodged, so it helps to learn how to take a hit."

traits.locale_text: « À votre place, j'accepterais cette évaluation sans sourciller et je tenterais de tirer une leçon de cette expérience douloureuse sur Thassera. On ne peut pas toujours éviter les coups du sort, mais il est possible d'apprendre à les encaisser. »

languages.text: «Si yo estuviese en su lugar, me tomaría con filosofía la valoración de la prefecta y aprendería de su dolorosa experiencia en Thassera. A veces la vida nos vapulea de un modo imposible de evitar, y en esos casos lo mejor es aprender a encajar el golpe».
languages.original_text: "If I were in your position, I would take the prefect's evaluation in stride and learn from your painful experience on Thassera. Sometimes, life knocks the wind out of you in a way that can't be dodged, so it helps to learn how to take a hit."

traits.locale_text: «Si yo estuviese en su lugar, me tomaría con filosofía la valoración de la prefecta y aprendería de su dolorosa experiencia en Thassera. A veces la vida nos vapulea de un modo imposible de evitar, y en esos casos lo mejor es aprender a encajar el golpe».

languages.text: “如果换做是我，我会对行政官的评价泰然处之，从塔瑟拉的痛苦经历中吸取教训。有的时候，人生就是充满了无从逃避的打击。因此，学会承受打击是有帮助的。”
languages.original_text: "If I were in your position, I would take the prefect's evaluation in stride and learn from your painful experience on Thassera. Sometimes, life knocks the wind out of you in a way that can't be dodged, so it helps to learn how to take a hit."

traits.locale_text: “如果换做是我，我会对行政官的评价泰然处之，从塔瑟拉的痛苦经历中吸取教训。有的时候，人生就是充满了无从逃避的打击。因此，学会承受打击是有帮助的。”

languages.text: "Sizin yerinizde olsaydım prefektin değerlendirmesini doğal karşılar ve Thassera'daki acı deneyimden ders çıkarırdım. Bazen hayat nefesinizi keser ve hiçbir şey yapamazsınız. Dolayısıyla darbeleri göğüslemeyi öğrenmek daima işe yarar."
languages.original_text: "If I were in your position, I would take the prefect's evaluation in stride and learn from your painful experience on Thassera. Sometimes, life knocks the wind out of you in a way that can't be dodged, so it helps to learn how to take a hit."

traits.locale_text: "Sizin yerinizde olsaydım Prefekt'in değerlendirmesini doğal karşılar ve Thassera'daki acı deneyimden ders çıkarırdım. Bazen hayat nefesinizi keser ve hiçbir şey yapamazsınız. Dolayısıyla darbeleri göğüslemeyi öğrenmek daima işe yarar."

languages.original_text: "If I were in your position, I would take the prefect's evaluation in stride and learn from your painful experience on Thassera. Sometimes, life knocks the wind out of you in a way that can't be dodged, so it helps to learn how to take a hit."
